name: Mapusoft
tag_list: embedded-os, software-interoperability, software-reuse, rtos, real-time-systems, hypervisor, upgrade-operating-system, embedded-operating-system, porting-os, code-migration, os-development-
overview: MapuSoft Technologies (MT) is the number one provider of embedded software re-use solutions. Our development platform, AppCOE (Application Common Operating Environment ) integrates all of MapuSoft’s solutions in one host environment for easy porting, abstraction, simulation, testing and conversion. The included tools are OS Changer Porting Kit, Cross-OS Development Platform, Cross-OS Hypervisor, Linux OK, OS Simulator, OS Version UpKit, Ada-C/C++ Changer and application/platform profilers. We provide full source code with no royalties.
